Name: High Brass
Description: This group consists of the Trumpet and Mellophone sections

Name: Low Brass
Description: This group consists of the Trombone, Baritone, and Sousaphone sections

Name: Woodwind
Description: This group consists of the Flute, Clarinet, and Saxophone sections

Name: Percussion
Description: This group consists of the Drumline and Front Ensemble sections

Name: Auxiliary
Description: This group consists of the Baton Twirlers and Colorguard section
